![prism with a triangular base](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/21da0fa2f1b8ebc905f9314b45bdc9ef520cafa1.png)
 
**Drag the corners of the triangle below to draw the shape of a horizontal slice through the prism.**
